commentList.content:
Really good hotel , in the center surrounded by the hutong. 
The room is clean and the place is quiet.

feedbackList.content: Dear guests, thank you very much for your good comments on our hotel. We will make persistent efforts to live up to your good comments. Thank you again for your affirmation of the hotel, look forward to coming again, and wish you a pleasant journey!

commentList.content: A lovely functional room with a comfortable mattress and a nice shower. Nice, warm heat in the winter. Friendly staff and good location. Would stay again.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡，德國沐浴、日本牙膏、乳膠床墊、羽絨床品……在睡眠和沐浴方面，CitiGO始終嚴守高品質標準。我們會繼續努力，創造更多更好的入住體驗，期待您再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for your trust and love for CitiGO, German bathing, Japanese toothpaste, latex mattresses, feather bedding... In terms of sleeping and bathing, CitiGO always strictly adheres to high quality standards. We will continue to work hard to create more and better check-in experience, and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.content: Perfect tiny room for one on the first floor. A little trouble at check in even though I live in Beijing. Convenient location. Great blackout curtains. Glass walls on the room with the toilet, so you better feel very comfortable with whomever you are sharing a room!

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人您好:感謝您能入住華住集團CitiGO酒店,門店座落在著名的南鑼鼓巷旁邊,西麪是后海,東麪是北京中醫醫院,南麪是王府井,北麪是鼓樓,周邊商業繁華,是您出遊的最佳選擇.酒店還為入住的客人免費提供同城行李寄送,包括北京火車站及首都機場,期待您的下次光臨!
feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest: Thank you for staying at the CitiGO Hotel of China Lodging Group. The store is located next to the famous Nanluoguxiang. The west is Houhai, the east is Beijing Traditional Chinese Medicine Hospital, the south is Wangfujing, the north is the Drum Tower, and the surrounding businesses Prosperity is your best choice for traveling. The hotel also provides free luggage delivery in the same city for guests staying, including Beijing Railway Station and Capital Airport. We look forward to your next visit!

commentList.content: A really well designed city hotel with everything you need for a good trip away (and excellent location near the Hutongs and lake)

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CiTiGO的信任和喜歡。一個人的朝九晚五不如一羣人的歡樂場。希望酒店豐富二強大的共享客廳，,給您帶來更多美好的體驗，期待您的每一次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for your trust and love to CiTiGO. One person’s nine-to-five is not as good as a group of people’s fun field. I hope that the hotel's rich and powerful shared living room will bring you more beautiful experiences and look forward to your every stay!

commentList.content: Superb location, I the heart of the old town, yet with a very modern feel inside. Good breakfast options, and optimal room space. Good cost/benefit ratio

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客，非常感謝您對我們酒店的好評，我們會再接再厲不辜負您的好評。再次感謝您對酒店的肯定，期待再次光臨，祝旅途愉快！

commentList.content:
it was nice clean room , all things look new, I like the function curtain opening when enter in room , no need to put card for electricity of room.
bed was comfortable .

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人您好:距離酒店100米的位置就是著名的南鑼鼓巷以及地鐵8號線和6號線,是您旅行的最佳選擇!

commentList.content: Wonderful hotel

feedbackList.content: Thank you very much for your trust and love. I look forward to your every stay.

commentList.content: Nice location, close to the subway station as well as the Nanluo hutongs.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客，非常感謝您對我們酒店的好評，我們會再接再厲不辜負您的好評。再次感謝您對酒店的肯定，期待再次光臨，祝旅途愉快！

commentList.content:
Lovely hotel with some modern features. The room was clean. The glass shower and toilet with mirror opposite meant that you could see each other going to the toilet so you had to actively look away. There is a curtain but it offers very little privacy. Ok for couples maybe but family type trips may be awkward. The room is very warm, bed very large and comfortable, water and soda is provided, but no tea or coffee in the room. 

Overall a good hotel near the hutongs, kind staff, modern with a delivery robot, in a good location for sightseeing.  Just be mindful of the bathroom situation when booking.

feedbackList.content: Dear guests, thank you for your comments on the hotel! We deeply regret your experience during your stay in the hotel. Your valuable opinions are very important to us. We will inform relevant departments of your opinions to improve service quality. We will also choose to paste frosted anti transparent glass film on the glass of later rooms. If you come here next time, I hope you can book this hotel again and give us a chance to apologize. Look forward to coming again!

commentList.content: 我就拍了一張外立麪，特大的驚喜，內部房間相對小而精，大門不是在沿街麪，一般都會先看到荷塘再走進來，也是一種迂迴
commentList.translatedContent: I just took a picture of the exterior, which was a big surprise. The interior rooms are relatively small and refined. The gate is not along the street. Usually, you will see the lotus pond first and then walk in. It is also a detour

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人您好，感謝您對CitiGO的喜歡和支持。CItiGO由國際知名設計師親自執筆設計，打造集“社區共享式大堂、輕生活方式、智能化客控”為一體的新概念空間。酒店始終致力於為您帶來高品質的入住體驗，期待您的再次入住！

commentList.content:
入住非常愉快的三晚，酒店就在南鑼鼓巷地鐵出口旁，外出遊玩乘坐地鐵和公交幾乎全覆蓋，非常便利。

酒店設施齊全，環境衛生，前台小哥哥小姐姐非常Nice,晚上餓了還有貼心的愛心宵夜—我最愛的小餛飩，味道靈格。
commentList.translatedContent:
It was a very pleasant stay for three nights. The hotel is next to the subway exit of Nanluoguxiang. It is very convenient to go out and take the subway and bus to almost all coverage.

The hotel has complete facilities and a hygienic environment. The brothers and sisters at the front desk are very nice. If you are hungry at night, there is a caring supper - my favorite little wonton, which tastes good.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO服務的認可！我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！

commentList.content:
酒店位置絕佳，地鐵口旁邊，別看臨街但是房間也不吵，隔音不錯的。挨着南鑼鼓巷，位置巨巨巨好。
酒店也很新，裝修風格我很喜歡，設施也很齊全，電動窗帘，真心很推薦！
早餐是送到房間的，一份也很多，營養齊全。
特別是酒店的服務太好了，前台小姐姐特別好。
commentList.translatedContent:
The location of the hotel is excellent, next to the subway entrance, don't look at the street, but the room is not noisy, and the sound insulation is good. Next to Nanluoguxiang, the location is very good.
The hotel is also very new, I like the decoration style very much, the facilities are also very complete, electric curtains, I really recommend it!
The breakfast is delivered to the room, there is a lot of it, and it is nutritious.
Especially the service of the hotel is great, the lady at the front desk is very nice.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人您好，感謝您對CitiGO的喜歡和支持。CItiGO由國際知名設計師親自執筆設計，打造集“社區共享式大堂、輕生活方式、智能化客控”為一體的新概念空間。酒店始終致力於為您帶來高品質的入住體驗，期待您的再次入住！

commentList.content: 酒店位置非常好，同時裝修很時尚，房間雖不大，但是細節做的很好，衛浴品牌也非常好，早餐和夜宵可以吃到很晚，特別適合年輕人。強烈推薦。
commentList.translatedContent: The location of the hotel is very good, and the decoration is very fashionable. Although the room is not big, the details are well done. The bathroom brand is also very good. Breakfast and supper can be eaten until late, especially suitable for young people. highly recommended.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO服務的認可！我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for your recognition of CitiGO service! We will continue to work hard to provide each guest with more considerate service and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.content: 位置離南鑼鼓巷幾十米，床很舒服，整體乾淨衛生，服務也很棒~早餐是送到房間裏的，可以免費寄存行李，水也是無限供應，入住體驗很好~
commentList.translatedContent: The location is tens of meters away from Nanluoguxiang. The bed is very comfortable, overall clean and hygienic, and the service is also great~ Breakfast is delivered to the room, you can store your luggage for free, and there is unlimited water supply. The check-in experience is very good~

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO服務的認可！我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for your recognition of CitiGO service! We will continue to work hard to provide each guest with more considerate service and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.content: 服務員熱情有禮，酒店感覺很溫馨，床品乾淨整潔，還有機器人送早餐，一套早晨營養豐富，酸奶、水果、主食、蔬菜還有粥，吃完小樓喝個美式咖啡。也可以小院坐坐，晒晒太陽，享受一個愜意的下午。
commentList.translatedContent: The waiters are warm and courteous, the hotel feels very warm, the bedding is clean and tidy, and there is a robot to deliver breakfast, a set of rich nutrition in the morning, yogurt, fruit, staple food, vegetables, and porridge. After eating the small building, drink an Americano. You can also sit in the small courtyard, bask in the sun, and enjoy a pleasant afternoon.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人您好，感謝您對CitiGO的喜歡和支持。CitiGO由國際知名設計師親自執筆設計，打造集“社區共享式大堂、輕生活方式、智能化客控”為一體的新概念空間。酒店始終致力於為您帶來高品質的入住體驗，期待您的再次入住！

commentList.content: 服務非常非常非常好！幫父母定的房間，行李較多，離店時酒店人員還幫忙把行李搬到車上，實在太謝謝了。早餐也十分美味，還送到了房間！
commentList.translatedContent: Service is very very very good! I booked a room for my parents with a lot of luggage. When I left the hotel, the hotel staff also helped to carry the luggage to the car. Thank you very much. The breakfast was also very delicious and it was delivered to the room!

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CiTiGO的信任和喜歡。德國淋浴、日本牙膏、乳膠床墊、羽絨床品....CitiGO客房始終嚴守高品質標準，請相信我們的真誠和用心致力於為每位客人創造奢華享受。我們會繼續努力，創造更多更好的入住體驗，期待您的每一次入住。

commentList.content: 剛到門口就有一個大哥熱情的幫我們拿行李，到前台後主動給我們拿了一瓶熱礦泉水，非常熱情，酒店非常智能化，大堂很亮堂，高大上，前台業務很熟練，還給免費升級了房型，辦理完入住后，幫我們拿行李，送到了電梯，非常方便，房間乾淨整潔．還有淡淡的香薰，房間網絡很快，24小時熱水，很方便，早餐豐盛，退房很人性化，非常滿意！下次再來！前台小姐姐服務態度好，暖心，入住送了水，還噓寒問暖的，好有愛，保潔阿姨，打掃衛生乾淨，早餐做的好吃，下次來一定還住他家！
commentList.translatedContent: As soon as we arrived at the door, a big brother helped us with our luggage enthusiastically. After arriving at the front desk, he took the initiative to bring us a bottle of hot mineral water. He was very enthusiastic, the hotel is very intelligent, the lobby is bright and tall, and the front desk business is very skilled. We upgraded the room type for free. After checking in, he helped us with our luggage and sent it to the elevator. It was very convenient and the room was clean and tidy. There is also a touch of aromatherapy, the room network is fast, 24 hours of hot water, very convenient, the breakfast is rich, the check-out is very user-friendly, very satisfied! come back next time! The lady at the front desk has a good service attitude, warm heart, water is provided when you check in, and she is very kind, so loving, cleaning aunt, cleaning, and breakfast is delicious.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡，德國沐浴、日本牙膏、乳膠床墊、羽絨床品……在睡眠和沐浴方面，CitiGO始終嚴守高品質標準。我們會繼續努力，創造更多更好的入住體驗，期待您再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for your trust and love for CitiGO, German bath, Japanese toothpaste, latex mattress, down bedding... CitiGO has always adhered to high quality standards in terms of sleep and bath. We will continue to work hard to create more and better stay experiences and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.content: 一進到酒店大門，就感受到了酒店濃厚的工業風氣息，前台服務周到細心，也很熱情，還幫忙拿行李，有問題也會及時回答，酒店的疫情防控手段也很到位，離做核酸的地方也很近，打包的早餐很豐盛也很好吃，尤其是粥非常好喝。距離南鑼鼓巷，后海，雍和宮等等都很近，辦理業務和吃喝玩樂都非常方便，交通也很便利，房間打掃的特別乾淨！床上用品乾淨整潔。
commentList.translatedContent: As soon as I entered the hotel door, I felt the strong industrial atmosphere of the hotel. The front desk service was thoughtful and attentive, and very enthusiastic. They also helped with luggage and answered questions in a timely manner. The hotel's epidemic prevention and control measures are also in place. The place is also very close, the packed breakfast is very rich and delicious, especially the porridge is very delicious. It is very close to Nanluoguxiang, Houhai, Lama Temple and so on. It is very convenient to handle business and eat, drink and play. The transportation is also very convenient. The room is very clean! The bedding was clean and tidy.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客：您好，非常感謝您入住南鑼鼓巷 CitiGO 歡閣酒店，很抱歉沒能給您帶來良好的入住體驗，我們一直秉持着服務第一的原則做好服務好每一位客人，希望您下次入住，給您帶來不一樣的入住感受。祝您生活愉快，工作順利！

commentList.content: 南鑼鼓巷地鐵出來就是，非常近，短頭髮的小姐姐上次承諾了升房，房間比上次的大了一些，早上陽光很足。夜宵雞湯餛飩很不錯，洗衣房也很方便。
commentList.translatedContent: The subway at Nanluoguxiang is very close. The young lady with short hair promised to upgrade the room last time. The room is a little bigger than the last time, and the morning sun is full. The late-night chicken soup wontons are very good, and the laundry room is also very convenient.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的賓客，非常感謝您對我們酒店的好評，我們會再接再厲不辜負您的好評。再次感謝您對酒店的肯定，期待再次光臨，祝旅途愉快！

commentList.content: 住了2天，前台和服務員都很nice，所有人見到顧客都會親切的問好，還有機器人送餐，酒店位置也很不錯，地鐵，景點都很近。
commentList.translatedContent: Stayed for 2 days, the front desk and waiters are very nice, everyone will greet customers kindly when they see customers, and robots will deliver meals. The location of the hotel is also very good, the subway and attractions are very close.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人您好，感謝您對CitiGO的喜歡和支持。CitiGO由國際知名設計師親自執筆設計，打造集“社區共享式大堂、輕生活方式、智能化客控”為一體的新概念空間。酒店始終致力於為您帶來高品質的入住體驗，期待您的再次入住！

CitiGO is designed by internationally renowned designers to create a new concept space integrating "community shared lobby, light lifestyle, and intelligent customer control". The hotel is always committed to bringing you a high-quality stay experience, and we look forward to your next stay!

commentList.content: 每一次真心的say hi和微笑都是一個溫暖的抱抱o(≧v≦)o
commentList.translatedContent: Every sincere say hi and smile is a warm hug o(≧v≦)o

commentList.translatedContent: The room is clean, tidy and comfortable, the service attitude is very good, the location is great, the transportation is safe and convenient, and the environment is very good at night

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CiTiGO的信任和喜歡。德國淋浴、日本牙膏、乳膠床墊、羽絨床品....CitiGO客房始終嚴守高品質標準，請相信我們的真誠和用心致力於為每位客人創造奢華享受。我們會繼續努力，創造更多更好的入住體驗，期待您的每一次入住

CitiGO rooms always adhere to high quality standards, please believe in our sincerity and dedication to creating luxury for every guest. We will continue to work hard to create more and better stay experiences and look forward to your every stay

commentList.content: 地點非常方便，距離8號線南鑼鼓巷地鐵口不到200米。雖然房間小些，但設施不錯，比較方便和實用。尤其床很舒服，房間每天提供免費的礦泉水和飲料，晚上十點二樓還有免費的餛飩宵夜，不錯~
commentList.translatedContent: The location is very convenient, less than 200 meters from the Nanluoguxiang subway exit of Line 8. Although the room is smaller, but the facilities are good, more convenient and practical. Especially the bed is very comfortable, the room provides free mineral water and drinks every day, and there is a free wonton supper on the second floor at ten o'clock in the evening, not bad~

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CiTiGO的信任和喜歡。德國淋浴、日本牙膏、乳膠床墊、羽絨床品....CitiGO客房始終嚴守高品質標準，請相信我們的真誠和用心致力於為每位客人創造奢華享受。我們會繼續努力，創造更多更好的入住體驗，期待您的每一次入住

CitiGO rooms always adhere to high quality standards, please believe in our sincerity and dedication to creating luxury for every guest. We will continue to work hard to create more and better stay experiences and look forward to your every stay

commentList.content: 酒店位置絕好，二環內，地鐵邊上，緊挨着步行街。衛生環境都可以。早上有早點送到房間，方便快捷！還可以寄存行李。美中不足的點是衛生間和洗浴間衹有帘子遮擋，帶孩子或朋友間入住不太方便。
commentList.translatedContent: The location of the hotel is excellent, within the second ring road, next to the subway, next to the pedestrian street. Hygienic environment is OK. It is delivered to the room early in the morning, which is convenient and fast! Luggage storage is also available. The fly in the ointment is that the bathroom and bathroom are only covered by curtains, so it is not convenient to stay with children or friends.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO服務的認可！我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！

commentList.content: 酒店非常滿意，前台很熱情也很耐心，這個價格的酒店，已經非常nice了，出門就是南鑼和地鐵站，故宮，天安門，王附井，鼓樓，什剎海，后海各種經典打車15以內，地鐵5站以內，非常方便，免費的宵夜小餛飩也很好吃，我吃了三碗。我帶兩個孩子，定了雙層房間，太香了，孩子自己在上麪玩，看電視，我可以在樓下刷手機，睡覺也分開睡，互不影響，難得旅行時也能晚上自己睡好覺。
commentList.translatedContent: The hotel is very satisfactory, the front desk is very warm and patient, the hotel at this price is already very nice, you can go out to Nanluo and subway stations, the Forbidden City, Tiananmen, Wangfujing, Drum Tower, Shichahai, Houhai, all kinds of classic taxis within 15, subway Within 5 stations, it is very convenient, and the free midnight snack is also delicious. I ate three bowls. I brought two children and booked a double-decker room. It is so fragrant. The children can play and watch TV on it. I can use my mobile phone downstairs and sleep separately without affecting each other. It is rare that I can sleep by myself at night when traveling. sleep well.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO服務的認可！我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Thank you for your recognition of CitiGO service! We will continue to work hard to provide each guest with more considerate service and look forward to your stay again!

commentList.content: 位置緊挨着南鑼鼓巷地鐵站，交通方便，就算步行到北海什剎海也就幾分鐘；硬件環境很溫馨，酒店還提供宵夜，服務nice
commentList.translatedContent: The location is next to the Nanluoguxiang Subway Station, with convenient transportation. It takes only a few minutes to walk to Beihai Shichahai. The hardware environment is very warm, and the hotel also provides late-night snacks. The service is nice

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO的信任和喜歡，德國沐浴、日本牙膏、乳膠床墊、羽絨床品......在睡眠和沐浴方面，CitiGO始終嚴守高品質標準。我們會繼續努力，創造更多更好的入住體驗，期待您再次入住！

commentList.content: 酒店位置太好，地鐵口，南鑼鼓巷口，去什剎海北海故宮天安門都很方便。周圍老字號早點，小吃店，羅森，不同檔次的餐館都有。

It is very convenient to go to the subway entrance, Nanluoguxiang entrance, and Tiananmen Square, the Forbidden City of Shichahai and Beihai. There are time-honored restaurants around, snack bars, Lawson, and restaurants of different grades.

feedbackList.content: 非常感謝您，在百忙之中給予酒店的點評，看到您如此真摯、耐心的評價，我們真的非常感動，時間會告訴我們，簡單地喜歡最長遠，平凡的陪伴最安心，懂你的人最溫暖

commentList.content: 非常滿意，乾淨衛生，交通便利，服務熱情，酒店帶公用洗衣機，洗衣服很方便，早餐營養配皮均衡，小機器人送早餐很可愛，夜宵還有餛飩提供
commentList.translatedContent: Very satisfied, clean and hygienic, convenient transportation, friendly service, the hotel has a public washing machine, it is very convenient to do laundry, the breakfast is nutritious and balanced, the small robot is very cute to deliver breakfast, and there are also wontons for supper

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CiTiGO的信任和喜歡，CitiGO客房始終嚴守高品質標準，請相信我們的真誠和用心致力於為每位客人創造奢華享受。CitiGO邀請國際知名設計師打造共享客廳、酒吧、餐廳、辦公、閱讀、音樂，除了“睡眠和沐浴”，我們鼓勵客人將其他時間交給酒店公區，給您帶來更多美好的體驗，期待您的每一次入住！

commentList.content: 很滿意，設施很新，服務好，浴巾厚實柔軟，早餐豐富多樣，位置特別好，就在南鑼鼓巷地鐵站旁邊，下次來還在這裏住。還有自助洗衣房，可以洗衣烘乾
commentList.translatedContent: Very satisfied, the facilities are very new, the service is good, the bath towels are thick and soft, the breakfast is rich and varied, the location is very good, just next to the Nanluoguxiang subway station, I will stay here next time. commentList.content: 地理位置好，周邊景點多，出遊很方便。房間布局合理，窗外景色好看，床墊非常舒適，燈具位置設置合理，早餐很豐富。
commentList.translatedContent: Good location, many surrounding attractions, travel is very convenient. The layout of the room is reasonable, the view from the window is good, the mattress is very comfortable, the location of the lamps is reasonable, and the breakfast is very rich.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CiTiGO的信任和喜歡。一個人的朝九晚五不如一羣人的歡樂場。希望酒店豐富二強大的共享客廳，,給您帶來更多美好的體驗，期待您的每一次入住！

commentList.content: 很難不給滿分，無論位置，條件等等都沒法挑剔，地鐵口和南鑼鼓巷的入口都在酒店步行2分鐘以內，豈不是完美？太完美了。歡閣帶給人那種輕鬆自如的氛圍隨處可見。房間一應俱全，特殊時期早餐機器人會把早餐送到你門口。就很開心。
commentList.translatedContent: It's hard not to give full marks. No matter the location, conditions, etc., you can't be picky. The subway entrance and the entrance of Nanluoguxiang are within a 2-minute walk of the hotel. Isn't it perfect? so perfect. Huan Pavilion brings the kind of relaxed atmosphere that can be seen everywhere. The rooms are readily available, and the breakfast robot will deliver breakfast to your door during special periods. very happy.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CiTiGO的信任和喜歡。德國淋浴、日本牙膏、乳膠床墊、羽絨床品....CitiGO客房始終嚴守高品質標準，請相信我們的真誠和用心致力於為每位客人創造奢華享受。我們會繼續努力，創造更多更好的入住體驗，期待您的每一次入住。

commentList.content: 酒店位置很好，就在南鑼鼓巷，去故宮，恭王府，什剎海玩都很近。服務態度超贊，而且有求必應。住宿條件很好，雙卧的大床1米8，一家四口兩大兩小睡得很寬敞。尤其要表揚二樓的服務人員張姐，工作認真負責，態度熱情！
commentList.translatedContent: The location of the hotel is very good, just in Nanluoguxiang, very close to the Forbidden City, Prince Gong's Mansion, and Shichahai. The service attitude is excellent and responsive to requests. The accommodation conditions are very good. The double-bedroom double bed is 1.8 meters. It is very spacious for a family of four, two or two to sleep. In particular, I would like to praise the service staff on the second floor, Ms. Zhang, for her serious and responsible work and enthusiastic attitude!

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CiTiGO的信任和喜歡。德國淋浴、日本牙膏、乳膠床墊、羽絨床品....CitiGO客房始終嚴守高品質標準，請相信我們的真誠和用心致力於為每位客人創造奢華享受。我們會繼續努力，創造更多更好的入住體驗，期待您的每一次入住。

commentList.content: 地理位置很棒！出門就是南鑼鼓巷，去哪裡都很方便。房間乾淨整潔，每天都會打掃。前台有咖啡機可以免費使用，工作人員都很友好。
commentList.translatedContent: Great location! It is Nanluoguxiang when you go out, so it is very convenient to go anywhere. The room is clean and tidy, cleaned every day. There is a coffee machine at the front desk that you can use for free, and the staff are very friendly.

feedbackList.content: 感謝您對CitiGO服務的認可！我們會繼續努力，為每位客人提供更加貼心的服務，期待您的再次入住！

commentList.content: 可以說是今年住過最nice的酒店，疫情期間住在這裏，首先位置就甭說了，去南鑼鼓巷就一分鐘，免費停車，我算了一下要是交停車費比住店還貴。房間雖不大，但乾淨、現代、智能。最大亮點就是前院這個花園，買了外賣坐這一吃，那叫一個美。
commentList.translatedContent: It can be said that it is the nicest hotel I have stayed in this year. I stayed here during the epidemic. First of all, not to mention the location. It only takes one minute to go to Nanluoguxiang. Parking is free. The room is small but clean, modern and smart. The biggest highlight is the garden in the front yard. If you buy takeout and eat here, it's a beauty.

feedbackList.content: 非常感謝您，在百忙之中給予酒店的點評，看到您如此真摯、耐心的評價，我們真的非常感動，時間會告訴我們，簡單地喜歡最長遠，平凡的陪伴最安心，懂你的人最溫暖

commentList.content: 郊區來市裡帶老人看病約的下午號，怕一上午老人受不了對比了好多家鐘點房選了歡閣，一層出入方便，房間也大，服務好，房間乾淨衛生，短暫的休息給老人到來了很大的幫助
commentList.translatedContent: In the afternoon, I came to the city to take the elderly to see a doctor. I was afraid that the elderly would not be able to stand it in the morning. I compared many hourly rooms and chose Huan Pavilion. a great help

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人您好，感謝您對CitiGO的喜歡和支持。CItiGO由國際知名設計師親自執筆設計，打造集“社區共享式大堂、輕生活方式、智能化客控”為一體的新概念空間。酒店始終致力於為您帶來高品質的入住體驗，期待您的再次入住！

CItiGO is designed by internationally renowned designers to create a new concept space integrating "community shared lobby, light lifestyle, and intelligent customer control". commentList.content:
設施：房內設施超級智能，保持得很新，而且在寸土寸金的地方還能享受免費停車，超贊！！！

衛生：乾淨整潔，毛巾浴巾感覺經常換新，還是毛絨絨的，沒有異味，沒有污漬

環境：周邊環境就不說了，喜歡深度遊覽的沒有不喜歡衚衕古巷的，雖是開車去的，在酒店不遠處就有個地鐵口，交通特別便利

服務：意想不到的是還有夜宵，熱呼呼的小餛飩，真不錯，早餐也很棒，送到房間的，葷素搭配，還有水果，酸奶，元氣滿滿的早餐！
commentList.translatedContent:
Facilities: The facilities in the room are super smart and kept very new, and you can enjoy free parking in the place where the land is expensive, which is great! ! !

Hygiene: clean and tidy, towels and bath towels feel that they are often replaced, still fluffy, no odor, no stains

Environment: I won't talk about the surrounding environment. Those who like in-depth tours don't like the ancient alleys. Although they are driving, there is a subway entrance not far from the hotel, and the transportation is very convenient.

Service: Unexpectedly, there are supper, hot little wontons, really good, breakfast is also very good, delivered to the room, with meat and vegetables, fruit, yogurt, full of energy for breakfast!

It is very quiet in the small courtyard, and the overall mottled design is well thought out. The room is not big, but the structure is reasonable and functional. Of course, intelligent service response is very fast.

commentList.content: 訂的雙層，床很大。裝修一般，但工作人員態度很棒。有洗衣房，外賣可以幫忙送上樓，機器人送餐，有咖啡和夜宵。地理位置也不錯很方便。酒店出門往左50米不到是南鑼郵局，裏面的雪糕個人覺得超值，可以蓋章。再往前是南鑼鼓巷，200米左右是核酸點。
commentList.translatedContent: Booked a bunk and the bed was huge. The decoration is average, but the attitude of the staff is great. There is a laundry room, takeaways can help you go upstairs, robots deliver meals, coffee and supper. The location is also good and convenient. The Nanluo Post Office is less than 50 meters to the left when you go out of the hotel. The ice cream inside is very valuable and can be stamped. Further ahead is Nanluoguxiang, and about 200 meters is the nucleic acid point.

feedbackList.content: 尊敬的客人您好，感謝您對CitiGO的喜歡和支持。CitiGO由國際知名設計師親自執筆設計，打造集“社區共享式大堂、輕生活方式、智能化客控”為一體的新概念空間。酒店始終致力於為您帶來高品質的入住體驗，期待您的再次入住！
feedbackList.translatedContent: Dear guest, thank you for your love and support of CitiGO. CitiGO is designed by internationally renowned designers to create a new concept space integrating "community shared lobby, light lifestyle, and intelligent customer control". The hotel is always committed to bringing you a high-quality stay experience, and we look forward to your next stay!

commentList.content:
1、房間小的可以，床三麪挨着牆，睡在裏面的人怎麼下床？行李箱打開沒地方放，直接放地上，下床就踩進行李箱裏。
2、洗澡沒有隱私可言，有個簾但衹能遮擋一麪，
3、沒窗帘，衹有一個電動窗紗，還是壞的，脫離軌道，卡在不上不下的位置，全是灰塵，想修理一下嗆一臉灰
4、攜程上早早訂好下午兩點退房，一大早又跟前台打招呼說下午兩點，沒到中午12點就奪命連環催讓退房
5、雙早就是兩份盒飯，帶孩子也就衹能兩份，盒飯豐盛的程度超乎想象，一個小米粥一個雞蛋一塊南瓜一點鹹菜，一小根生香蕉，北京全部酒店都能堂食，他這是節約成本呢，還不如就根本沒有
6、入住期間電梯壞了，拎着超重行李箱走樓梯可想而知多費勁
以上皆是實事求是評價，能接受者訂吧，我再也不會來了
commentList.translatedContent:
1. The room is small. The bed is next to the wall on three sides. How can the person sleeping in it get out of bed? There is no place to put the suitcase open, so put it directly on the ground, and step into the suitcase when you get out of bed.
2. There is no privacy in the bath. There is a curtain but only one side is covered.
3. No curtains, only one electric window screen, still broken, off track, stuck in the position where it can't go up or down, it's full of dust, I want to fix it and choke my face
4. Ctrip booked a check-out at 2:00 pm early in the morning, and said hello to the front desk early in the morning at 2:00 pm.
5. There are two lunch boxes for two days, and only two for children. The richness of the lunch box is beyond imagination. One millet porridge, one egg, one pumpkin, a little pickle, and a small piece of raw banana, all hotels in Beijing can dine in. He is saving costs, it is better to not have it at all
6. The elevator was broken during the stay, and it is conceivable to take the stairs with an overweight suitcase.
The above are all pragmatic evaluations, those who can accept it, please order it, I will never come again

feedbackList.content: 抱歉給您帶來不好的入住體驗，您的意見和建議已經收到，對於您入住期間遇到的小插曲深感抱歉，我們會儘快有效的解決問題根源。入住期間有任何問題也可以隨時撥打前台電話反饋，我們會立刻進行處理。祝您生活愉快。

commentList.content:
看了這麼多好評 以為真的很好
結果大跌眼鏡
本來約了三晚 果斷取消 衹住一晚趕緊換

衛生：首先是衛生 看起來好像很乾凈 實際上並不咋樣 房間小 燈光暗 黑乎乎的裝修風格 開窗拉紗窗的時候 沒被上麪的灰嗆出病

服務：服務就更不行了 要的東西打電話半天送不來 還得下去找他們 花這麼多錢訂的景觀大床房 結果就是馬路邊上的房間 根本沒有南鑼景觀

交通：可能就交通還行吧 在南鑼地鐵站旁 
另外 這裏的房間洗手間和過道用帘子拉着 洗澡非常不方便 外麪透視 帶孩子極不方便 慎選
commentList.translatedContent:
After reading so many good reviews, I thought it was really good
The results are astounding
Originally made an appointment for three nights, but decided to cancel it, only stayed for one night and changed it quickly

Hygiene: First of all, it looks clean and it looks clean. It's not that bad. The room is small. The lighting is dark and the decoration style is dark.

Service: The service is even worse

Transportation: Maybe it's okay for transportation. It's next to Nanluo subway station.
In addition, the bathroom and aisle of the room here are drawn with curtains. It is very inconvenient to take a shower. It is very inconvenient to take a child with a perspective from the outside. Choose carefully

feedbackList.content: 抱歉給您帶來不好的入住體驗，您的意見和建議已經收到，我們會儘快核查進行處理，有效的解決問題根源。入住期間有任何問題也可以隨時撥打前台電話反饋，我們會立刻進行處理
feedbackList.translatedContent: I am sorry to bring you a bad check-in experience. Your comments and suggestions have been received. We will check and deal with them as soon as possible to effectively solve the root cause of the problem. If you have any questions during your stay, you can always call the front desk for feedback, we will deal with it immediately

ratingCalculationInfo.title: How ratings are calculated
ratingCalculationInfo.content: To ensure the authenticity of the ratings that are displayed, we don't simply calculate an average. Instead, we make scientific calculations based on the review credibility and the freshness of the guest's experience to get the final rating.
